name: ActiveCalculator
author: Abdul Moiz

sections.description:
Transform your WordPress site into a dynamic hub of customer engagement with ActiveCalculator! This robust and intuitive calculator plugin is crafted for businesses aiming to offer their clients a seamless way to estimate costs, savings, and other crucial metrics right on their website.

Why ActiveCalculator is a must-have for your WordPress site:

Branding Consistency: With ActiveCalculator, you’re not just adding functionality; you’re enhancing your brand. Customize the design of your calculators to match your website’s style and maintain a cohesive brand image across every page.
Multi-Platform Compatibility: Whether your customers are on desktops, tablets, or mobile devices, ActiveCalculator’s responsive design ensures that everyone has a flawless experience.
Insightful Analytics: Keep track of how visitors interact with your calculators and gain valuable insights into their preferences, driving informed business decisions.
Lead Generation: Convert casual site visitors into leads. ActiveCalculator doubles as a lead capture tool, letting you collect contact information seamlessly as part of the calculation process.

Perfect for a range of uses:

Price estimations
ROI calculations
Service quotes
Savings assessments
And many more!

With ActiveCalculator, the possibilities are as limitless as the calculations you can create. It’s not just an addition to your website; it’s a smart investment in your online presence that pays dividends in customer satisfaction and engagement.

Trouble-Free Installation and Support: ActiveCalculator ensures a smooth installation process, whether it’s automatic, via upload, or manual. Once installed, adding calculators to your site is a breeze with the Gutenberg block editor. Just insert, input your calculator ID, and you’re set.

Our dedicated support team stands by to assist with any inquiries or issues, ensuring that your experience with ActiveCalculator is as flawless as the calculations it performs.

Elevate Your Website with ActiveCalculator Today!

Install ActiveCalculator and provide your visitors with the interactive tools they need to make informed decisions, all while elevating your brand and streamlining your lead generation process.

For more detailed installation instructions, please refer to the Installation section above.

Requirements

The plugin requires a ActiveCalculator account. Sign up for free at https://activecalculator.com.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Go to the Plugin menu and click on the Add New Button
  2. Search for ActiveCalculator
  3. Install and activate the ActiveCalculator plugin from there

Download & Upload:

  1. Download the ActiveCalculator plugin (.zip file)
  2. In your admin area, go to the Plugins menu and click on Add New
  3. Click on Upload Plugin and choose the activecalculator.zip file and click on Install Now
  4. Activate the plugin and Enjoy!

Manually:

  1. Download and upload the activecalculator plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

Use Block:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Add one or more blocks from the block category called ActiveCalculator in the Gutenberg editor
  3. Make sure you have a calculator ready to be embedded and Enter the ID of the calculator you want to embed in the ActiveCalculator block.
  4. Enjoy!

short_description: Build a custom calculator on ActiveCalculator and easily add it to your WordPress site!
